Class CardTest

java.lang.Object

class CardTest
extends java.lang.Object
Class CardTest tests Card class.
See Also:
Card

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    (package private) void descriptionTest()
    Method descriptionTest checks the correct description deploying of the selected god.
    (package private) void listTest()
    Method listTest tries the listing of the gods, which is used during the challenger phase.
    (package private) void parseTest()
    Method parseTest tests input parsing and checks the correct working of the class.

  • Method Details

    • parseTest

      @Test @DisplayName("Input parsing test") void parseTest() throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Method parseTest tests input parsing and checks the correct working of the class.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the received string is not an element of the enumeration class.

    • listTest

      @Test @DisplayName("God listing test") void listTest()
      Method listTest tries the listing of the gods, which is used during the challenger phase.

    • descriptionTest

      @Test @DisplayName("God description parsing test") void descriptionTest() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Method descriptionTest checks the correct description deploying of the selected god.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - when file is invalid.
